data.title: The Global Professional Tennis Coach Association (GPTCA)
data.meta_description: (GPTCA) is an international organization dedicated to educating, training, and assisting professional tennis coaches who wish to evolve at the ATP World Tour.
data.text:
1998-2012

Professional tennis player

• Best singles ranking – 3

• Best doubles ranking - 70

• 10 Singles Titles / 14 Singles Finals (Winner Indian Wells 2010, finals Madrid 2005, Bercy 2005, Miami 2006…)

• Olympic bronze medal doubles with Mario Ancic – Athens 2004

• 2 appearances at Tennis Masters Cup (now World Tour Finals)

• Davis Cup title 2005

Tennis related activities:

2002-2004

ATP Player Council member

2004-2006

ATP Player Council Vice President

2006-2008

ATP Player Council President

June 2008-February 2009

ATP Board Player Representative

2006

Davis Cup playing Captain

2012

Sky Italy – TV expert

2013

Manager of Tomas Berdych

Coach of Milos Raonic

2016

Coach of Roger Federer

2005

Co-owner of Hotel Mozart (five stars) in Opatija, Croatia

2010

Co-owner of Dogma Real Estate, the largest real estate agency in Croatia

2012

Member of General Assembly of HNK Rijeka football club

2005

Croatian Sportsman of the Year Award

2006

Croatian Sportsman of the Year Award

2007

ATP World Tour Humanitarian of the Year Award
